comment: I already read this. So that part was boring. But her golden goose? That would make a great video. It could be WHY they were having arguments where there was shouting, if she was being like a parasite. I mean, complaining about JD saying he needed work, and he wanted to keep working all the time. I know of other actors that like to keep their calenders full and always have a project to work on. It sounded like she was trying to slow him down, so he would only do the most artistically focused, however you say that. I don't know, it seemed hinky to me a bit, her taking ALL the credit for his entire catalog of movies up to a certain point. She was, "I got him those jobs." It made it sound like he had no acting skills, whatsoever. Very weird! We're talking about Johnny Depp here! You may have opened the door, Tracey, but it was JD that auditioned, was chosen, and played those parts to perfection.

comment: Can anyone point out any time during JD's career that he had problems on set? Have you ever heard of castmates or crew taking issue with his behavior on set? Have you ever heard of him being anything but professional and uncommonly kind on any of his films? Has any fellow actor or crew member ever had anything negative to say about the  man...before AH wormed her way into his life? Because I sure havent! The only film I have ever heard of JD having issues on was POTC 5, and we all know exactly what he was going through during that time . I seriously can't believe the gall of this cow! Her nobody @$$ came into his life and suddenly we're supposed to believe everything she and her leeching friends have to say about him. Not what's been said of him for over 30 years. She is supposed to be the only person on Earth who truly knows "the real JD". He's been fooling us all this whole time. He's just been surrounded by yes men his whole career, and she's the only person ever in the entire world who was willing to call him on his BS? Once again she's just a narc being narc. Puffing herself up as if she's this virtuous, saint of a woman that was sent from the heavens to save Johnny from himself...because noone else ever could. What a crock of shite!!!
